projects.title: Tarjetly
projects.description: Digital platform to create and share smart business cards.
projects.longDescription: Tarjetly allows businesses and professionals to create digital business cards with interactive information, direct links and interaction analytics. The project includes an admin panel, visual editor and REST API with secure authentication.

projects.title: Sismol
projects.description: Web administrative panel for managing and monitoring the water collection system.
highlights: Dashboard with real-time metrics from collection sensors
User, permissions and administrative roles management
Data visualization with interactive tables and advanced filters
Responsive and accessible design optimized for desktop and tablets

projects.title: Tendero
projects.description: Mobile POS application for sales and inventory management in small businesses.

projects.title: Tlalocapp
projects.description: Mobile platform to supervise and manage the collection and distribution of water resources.
